description: Whether this holiday is observed by federally-regulated industries
corresponding attribute description: A boolean parameter. If true or 1, will return only federal holidays. If false or 0, will return no federal holidays

description: Whether this is a province-wide statutory holiday, or one that is optional for employers
corresponding attribute description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC

description: Whether this is a province-wide statutory holiday, or one that is optional for employers
corresponding attribute description: A boolean parameter. If false or 0 (default), will return only legislated holidays. If true or 1, will return optional holidays from Alberta and BC
